Hellplague/ Malice/ Organics:
 
"Think what you want, but I wanted to have fun with him, but he's dead now.  Hmp, oh well.  Let's end this."
Hellplague jumped down and tried to get to Necross and Splattercannon, when Organics opened fire on her.  Hellplague shot her a dirty look, then opened fire on the valkyrie.  Organics fell to one knee, spitting curses as she dropped.  
"Blast you!   He was my brother!"
"Oh, I am a little broke up about it," Hellplague said as she took aim to finish Organics off, when a comm channel opened to Organics.  Through it was nothing but static, but soon, a sadistic laugh came through.  Soon the laugh came from behind Hellplague as a glowing being stepped from the chasm.  Several shards of energon had pierced his body, but the energy was soon drained, and the clear shards fell to the ground.  Malice, now shining as bright as a star, stood, healed, and energized beyond anything he had experianced before.
"Hellplague is it?  Well then, let's finish our little game then."
The addressed minion stared in shock,  was this Maximal a ghost?

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:


"You could have more fun killing MAximalssnarled 
Blacknightmare "UNICRON..."

The femme was hit by Organic's shot


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice/ Hellplague:
>  
> "And why should I?  Why destroy them all?  We can use him, take to 
Unicron to serve with us."
> She finished in time for Organics to appear and open up on 
Blacknightmare.  Hellplague sighs and turns to face Malice, only to 
get punched in the face.
> "My, we have a temper.  I will enjoy breaking that habit." 
> Hellplague launches herself on Malice, wrapping her arms around 
his waist, swinging her body behind him, and then picked him up.  
She threw him to the ground, and sat on his chest.  He was 
temporarily stunned, so she took the stray chance to cup his face 
and kiss him again.  The bounty hunter roused around to find himself 
being kissed a second time.  The minion breaks the kiss, a satisfied 
look on her face.
> "Did you enjoy that?" Malice said in a deep, unforgiving 
voice,"cause that may be the last one you get."
> The minion was genuinly suprised, even as Malice delivered a 
punishing blow to her exposed abdomine.  She stood, then doubled 
over, gasping for breath.  malice sood and stretched his back.  He 
had his sinister grin as he approached, and then charged.  Body 
checking Hellplague, Malice used the momentuum to punch, kick and 
slash, with his claws and limbs.  Hellplague came to rest near a 
ridge over looking an enormous energon deposit.  She looke over the 
edge down into the glowing chasm, and as Malice charged again, got 
an idea.  Just before he got to her, Hellplague jumped up and over 
the hunter, and kicked hard, sending him to the chasm floor.  Malice 
fell, tumbled, and came o rest, impaled with giant shards of energon 
piercing his body.  He rests motionless, before the rest of the 
fighters to see.  Hellplague staggers to her feet, and looks down to 
the bounty hunter.
> "Tsk, a shame.  I wanted to have fun with him." 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNighmare:
> 
> 
> "EXCUSE ME HELLPLAGUE!!!"said annoyed BlackNightmare "This male 
IT'S 
> MINE!!!! So get lost and find other maxi-fool to fight... 'cause 
> UNICRON will be mad if he knows that you're kissing the ENEMIE!!!"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice/ ????:
> >  
> > Malice breifly reeled from the fist in the face, but recovered 
and 
> back handed the minion.  He drew his sword and prepared to strike 
> the final blow to Blacknightmare.  
> >  
> > Without warning, the sixth minion sprang into action.  She dived 
> down on the bounty hunter and tackled him.  Both roll around on 
the 
> ground until they are a fair distance away from the rest of the 
> fighting.  They rested, with the sixth minion sitting on top of 
> Malice, and both trying to force the other away.  She leaned down 
> until their faces were only inches apart.
> > "My, a powerful one.  And what is your name?" she asked in a 
> seductive tone.
> > "My name, is Malice, the single most powerful bounty hunter to 
> walk any world," the transmetal male said as he continued pushing 
> against his opponent,"and who are you?"
> > "My name is Hellplague," she said, and stole a kiss before 
pushing 
> herself off the hunter.  Said hunter stood and tried to wipe the 
> action from his face.
> > "You ought to keep your face to your self, lady, it will get you 
> in trouble one of these days."
> > Hellplague smirked and giggled to herself, thenm both charged 
> forward and engaged in another stalemate.
>
